data.title: Find a Certified Company
data.meta_description: We’ve compiled a list of certified companies using the latest data. We’ve built a list of certified companies based on the latest reports provided by active certification bodies, or CBs. The point of the data in this list is to show whether a company is certified or to help brands find certified suppliers. Intermediaries will need to contact us if they want to use this data to provide validation or any verification services.
data.text: We’ve built a list of certified companies, materials, and products based on the latest data provided by active certification bodies. This list serves as a single source of truth for all scope certificates. It shows whether a company is certified and helps brands in sourcing certified materials. If you are unable to find a certified company or scope certificate here, please lodge an enquiry with your certification body.
